text: Lorenzo Chiarinelli (16 March 1935 - 3 August 2020) was an Italian Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Concerviano, Italy. He became a priest in 1957. He was made a bishop in 1983 by Pope John Paul II. He was the Bishop of Sora-Cassino-Aquino-Pontecorvo from 1983 to 1993, Aversa from 1993 to 1997 and Viterbo from 1997 to 2010. Chiarinelli died on 3 August 2020 at the age of 85.Lutto. Addio al vescovo Chiarinelli ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Lorenzo Chiarinelli
